examples.example: 无论遇到什么困难，朋友们总是会在第一时间伸出援助之手。

translate.english: No matter what difficulties are encountered, friends will always extend a helping hand in the first place.

examples.example: 真正的朋友会在你成功时真心为你高兴。

translate.english: A true friend will be truly happy for you when you succeed.

examples.example: 我的朋友们都对我很友好，我们一起度过了许多欢乐的时光。

translate.english: My friends are all very friendly to me and we have spent a lot of happy times together.
